name: Hiland Cruiser Bike
description: This bike has a lightweight alluminum alloy frame with a low step-through design for easy mounting and dismounting.The retro aesthetic design and lightweight frame is sleek and made for the city roads.

name: Hiland Mountain Bike
description: 【High tech Frame】Hiland H200 has Light Aluminum frame is packed with features that make your ride better. Good performance suspension fork make it playful enough for new riders and experienced shredders riding from packed single track to the loose stuff.

name: Eurobike 21
description: Road bike has a 21-speed transmission system, and the correct use of the transmission can cope with complex road conditions and weather such as flat roads, up and down slopes, dirt roads, and top winds.

name: Mongoose Dolomite Mens
description: Conquer any off-road trail with ease with this steel-framed mountain bike with supersized all-terrain knobby tires

name: Hiland Aluminum Mountain Bike
description: Hiland GAMILLE 300 has a high quality ultralight aluminum frame to enjoy your adventures. This design also makes for a lower standover height, which is good for shorter riders because it allows them to straddle their bike more easily

name: Schwinn Mountain
description: Durable mountain bike designed for trails and neighborhood rides Alloy crank provides steady gearing and less maintenance. Twist shifters with rear derailleur for quick gear changes on the trail
